TopicTitle: Post your craazy career mode ships.

Articles.Content:
Career mode is hard, and to get science we do alot of crazy things, show a picture of your crazy career mode ship, and if you feel like, add a craft file.

I'll start with my first flight in career mode, the rocket got up to 13000 meters, and could have got higher, with alot of fuel left.

It actually went pretty well, and i got 5 science.

Well anyways time to see your guys crazy career ships!
Leave the liquid tanks behind, they're not doing you any favors.

Leave the liquid tanks behind, they're not doing you any favors.

I know that, i put them there just for decoration.

Got the Stability upgrade on the tech tree today, so i made a new rocket..

Everything went (almost) well, and it got up to 230000 feet.

The only problem was that my PC froze on reenentry and i had to force quit KSP..

I need to get a new PC, A Crapbook air with 4gb of ram is a baaaad gaming computer!

Several posts have been removed from this thread for violating forum rule "2.3 Other forbidden messages... a Messages that lack any substantial content." Also, if you have a problem with something another member has posted, please refer the matter to a moderator through the "report this post" button rather than exchange insults with each other.
